item.title: Item stats and items for owner only
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

idk if this will work, i just converted it from donator items to moditems you can make more and just change the player rights to 2 and 3…

on top of this

add this

and in these

public void getRequirements(String itemName, int itemId) { c.attackLevelReq = c.defenceLevelReq = c.strengthLevelReq = c.rangeLevelReq = c.magicLevelReq =

add this to it c.playerRights = 1;

then in the wear item add this

if(c.playerRights == 1) for(int i : ModItems) if(wearID == i) { c.sendMessage("You must be a Mod to wear this item."); return false; }

and in all the weapon requirements add this

[code] if(itemName.contains(“NAME HERE”)) {

			c.playerRights = 1;

		
	}[/code]

might not work… post the errors if you get any

Read full topic
